items.content_html: A lightweight Express.js starter template configured with TypeScript for rapid development. This template provides a solid foundation for building web applications using the popular Express.js framework, allowing you to focus on your application's logic rather than initial setup.
items.title: iibrahim70/express-mvc-template: A lightweight Express.js starter template configured with TypeScript for rapid development. This template provides a solid foundation for building web applications using the popular Express.js framework, allowing you to focus on your application's logic rather than initial setup.

items.content_html: "VfyJS is a sophisticated JavaScript library crafted to fortify projects. Its lightweight design offers a comprehensive solution for seamless value validation, ensuring data integrity and empowering developers with an advanced platform to effortlessly address diverse validation tasks in their projects."

Its lightweight design offers a comprehensive solution for seamless value validation, ensuring data integrity and empowering developers with an advanced platform to effortlessly address diverse validation tasks in their projects."

items.content_html: Xprz is a lightweight and concise wrapper for Express.js, designed to simplify the process of building web applications with a minimalistic syntax. With XprsJS, you can define routes, handle middleware, and set up an Express.js server with ease.
items.title: Xprzjs/Xprz: Xprz is a lightweight and concise wrapper for Express.js, designed to simplify the process of building web applications with a minimalistic syntax. With XprsJS, you can define routes, handle middleware, and set up an Express.js server with ease.

items.content_html: 🏠 A lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CCU3, ELV-Charly or for running your CloudFree "homematicIP CCU" IoT smarthome central as a pure virtual appliance (under Proxmox VE, Home Assistant, Docker/OCI, LXC, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on your own device (e.g. RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, ODROID, intelNUC, etc.)
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CCU3, ELV-Charly or for running your CloudFree "homematicIP CCU" IoT smarthome central as a pure virtual appliance (under Proxmox VE, Home Assistant, Docker/OCI, LXC, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on your own device (e.g. RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, ODROID, intelNUC, etc.)
